segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, and water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might slip and fall if she's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see two children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he will fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, she seems excited and happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being sneaky and mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and catches them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside the window, it looks calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the scene inside the kitchen is quite chaotic in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
